languages.text: "Госпожа Зауэрбэк вместе с блюстителями держит оборону на офицерской палубе. Я нахожусь здесь же, координируя лояльные силы. Нам удается удерживать ключевые отсеки, но переломить ход сражения мы пока не в силах. Мостик захвачен противником, Главный кормчий... его судьба неизвестна".

"Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Зауэрбэк вместе с блюстителями держит оборону на офицерской палубе. Я нахожусь здесь же, координируя лояльные силы. Нам удается удерживать ключевые отсеки, но переломить ход сражения мы пока не в силах. Мостик захвачен противником, Главный кормчий... его судьба неизвестна".

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we haven't managed to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy, the Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

"Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we haven't managed to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy, the Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy; the Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy; the Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

"Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

"Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

languages.text: «La maestra Sauerback y los guardias están defendiendo la cubierta de oficiales. Yo también estoy aquí, coordinando las fuerzas leales. Los compartimentos clave resisten el asalto, pero aún no hemos conseguido cambiar las tornas de la batalla. El enemigo ha tomado el puente. El estado del maestro timonel... es incierto».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

traits.locale_text: «La maestra Sauerback y los guardias están defendiendo la cubierta de oficiales. Yo también estoy aquí, coordinando las fuerzas leales. Los compartimentos clave resisten el asalto, pero aún no hemos conseguido cambiar las tornas de la batalla. El enemigo ha tomado el puente. El estado del maestro timonel... es incierto».

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック氏とエンフォーサーたちが、士官デッキの防衛に回っています。私もここで、忠誠軍の指揮を執っているところです。主要な区画は防衛できていますが、戦局を好転させるまでには至っていません。ブリッジは敵に制圧されています。マスター・ヘルムスマンの安否は…不明です」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック氏とエンフォーサーたちが、士官デッキの防衛に回っています。私もここで、忠誠軍の指揮を執っているところです。主要な区画は防衛できていますが、戦局を好転させるまでには至っていません。ブリッジは敵に制圧されています。マスター・ヘルムスマンの安否は…不明です」

languages.text: “苏尔贝克女士和她的执法者正在守卫军官甲板，我也在这里，努力调动忠诚船员的力量。所有关键的舱室都还在，但我们还没扭转战局。舰桥已经被敌人占领，舵手长的命运……无人知晓。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克女士和她的执法者正在守卫军官甲板，我也在这里，努力调动忠诚船员的力量。所有关键的舱室都还在，但我们还没扭转战局。舰桥已经被敌人占领，舵手长的命运……无人知晓。”

languages.text: "Herrin Sauerback und die Enforcers verteidigen das Offiziersdeck. Ich bin ebenfalls hier und koordiniere die Loyalistentruppen. Die wichtigsten Module halten noch, doch wir konnten das Blatt in der Schlacht noch nicht wenden. Der Feind hat die Brücke überlaufen. Über das Schicksal des Hauptsteuermanns ... ist nichts bekannt."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Sauerback und die Enforcers verteidigen das Offiziersdeck. Ich bin ebenfalls hier und koordiniere die Loyalistentruppen. Die wichtigsten Module halten noch, doch wir konnten das Blatt in der Schlacht noch nicht wenden. Der Feind hat die Brücke überlaufen. Über das Schicksal des Hauptsteuermanns ... ist nichts bekannt."

languages.text: « Maîtresse Sauerback et les prévôts défendent actuellement le pont des officiers, d'où je coordonne les troupes loyalistes. Les compartiments clés tiennent bon, mais nous n'avons pas encore réussi à renverser le cours de la bataille. L'ennemi a envahi la passerelle. Nous ignorons ce qu'il est advenu du maître timonier. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Sauerback et les prévôts défendent actuellement le pont des officiers, d'où je coordonne les troupes loyalistes. Les compartiments clés tiennent bon, mais nous n'avons pas encore réussi à renverser le cours de la bataille. L'ennemi a envahi la passerelle. Nous ignorons ce qu'il est advenu du maître timonier. »

languages.text: "Sauerback Hanım, infazcılarla birlikte subay güvertesini savunuyor. Ben de buradayım, kuvvetlerimizin koordinasyonunu sağlıyorum. Ana kompartımanlar dayanıyor ama mücadelenin gidişatını henüz lehimize çeviremedik. Köprü, düşman kuvvetlerinin eline geçti. Başserdümen'in akıbeti... Meçhul."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback and the enforcers are defending the officers' deck. I am also here, coordinating the loyalist forces. The key compartments are holding, but we have not been able to turn the tide of battle just yet. The bridge has been overrun by the enemy. The Master Helmsman's fate... is unknown."
